channel.title: Posts on Doug's Resume
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Doug's Resume

item.title: How to Become a Master of Time
item.description: Intro As a professional engineering team manager with experience and background in project management and business analysis as both a consultant and full time employee, consistency, quality, and timeliness of delivery are expected by every organization I’ve had the opportunity to work with. I take this expectation to heart and, frankly, have made it a part of my identity as a professional, in an effort to meet the needs of my clients and employers.
